name: Air Control (itch)
description:
The game does not work properly in Firefox, please use Chrome to see the proper colours.

Direct the planes to their matching color airport (4 colors). You can control them by clicking then clicking again somewhere to set the direction.
New airplanes are constantly arriving at increasing rates from all angles.

The camera is controlled by WASD / TFGH / IJKL / arrow keys or
by bringing the mouse to the edge of the screen.
You can turn on/off the mouse panning by pressing C.
